name: The Viridescent Hunt
effect: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding enemies, dealing {0}% of ATK as DMG to these enemies every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every {1}s.
description: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose home was the forest.
